subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: VCÖ is a member of the European Federation for Transport and Environment (T&E)
goals__remit:
VCÖ - Mobilität mit Zukunft is a non governmental organisation. The vision of VCÖ - Mobilität mit Zukunft is a transport policy, which ensures mobility without having negative effects on health, safety or the environment. 
 
Founded in 1988 as a non-profit organisation, VCÖ is supported by more than 6.000 individuals as well as a wide range of organisations and companies as supporters and sponsors. In the form of studies and factsheets, VCÖ provides  background knowledge and research. VCÖ furthermore organises different types of events such as the yearly “Mobilitätspreis” (Mobility Award), Roundtables with experts, Background Information Evenings or bigger workshops.
